sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.0%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 5.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is General Electric ( GE ), trading down 3.3%.
General Electric is lower by about 27.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 0.5%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 1.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
